mil4.5:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ayaṁ bhūmibhāgo aṭṭha mantadosavivajjito, ahañca loke paramo mantisahāyo,
mil4.5:1.1_1: guyhamanurakkhī cāhaṁ yāvāhaṁ jīvissāmi tāva guyhamanurakkhissāmi, aṭṭhahi ca me
mil4.5:1.1_2: kāraṇehi buddhi pariṇāmaṁ gatā, dullabho etarahi mādiso antevāsī, sammā paṭipanne
mil4.5:1.1_3: antevāsike ye ācariyānaṁ pañcavīsati ācariyaguṇā, tehi guṇehi ācariyena sammā paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
mil4.5:2.1_0: Idha, bhante nāgasena, ācariyena antevāsimhi satataṁ samitaṁ ārakkhā upaṭṭhapetabbā,
mil4.5:2.1_1: asevanasevanā jānitabbā, pamattāppamattā jānitabbā, seyyāvakāso jānitabbo, gelaññaṁ
mil4.5:2.1_2: jānitabbaṁ, bhojanassa laddhāladdhaṁ jānitabbaṁ, viseso jānitabbo, pattagataṁ saṁvibhajitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_3: assāsitabbo ‘mā bhāyi, attho te abhikkamatī’ti, ‘iminā puggalena paṭicaratī’ti paṭicāro
mil4.5:2.1_4: jānitabbo, gāme paṭicāro jānitabbo, vihāre paṭicāro jānitabbo, na tena hāso davo
mil4.5:2.1_5: kātabbo, tena saha ālāpo kātabbo, chiddaṁ disvā adhivāsetabbaṁ, sakkaccakārinā bhavitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_6: akhaṇḍakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, arahassakārinā bhavitabbaṁ, niravasesakārinā bhavitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_7: ‘janemimaṁ sippesū’ti janakacittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, ‘kathaṁ ayaṁ na parihāyeyyā’ti
mil4.5:2.1_8: vaḍḍhicittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, ‘balavaṁ imaṁ karomi sikkhābalenā’ti cittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.1_9: mettacittaṁ upaṭṭhapetabbaṁ, āpadāsu na vijahitabbaṁ, karaṇīye nappamajjitabbaṁ,
mil4.5:2.2_0: Ime kho, bhante, pañcavīsati ācariyassa ācariyaguṇā, tehi guṇehi mayi sammā paṭipajjassu,
mil4.5:2.2_1: saṁsayo me, bhante, uppanno, atthi meṇḍakapañhā jinabhāsitā, anāgate addhāne tattha
mil4.5:2.2_2: viggaho uppajjissati, anāgate ca addhāne dullabhā bhavissanti tumhādisā buddhimanto,
mil4.5:2.2_3: tesu me pañhesu cakkhuṁ dehi paravādānaṁ niggahāyā”ti.
